name: ramalama (containers)
description: [项目级] RamaLama is an open-source developer tool that simplifies the local serving of AI models from any source and facilitates their use for inference in production, all through the familiar language of containers.。来源: https://github.com/containers/ramalama

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
RamaLama is an open-source developer tool that simplifies the local serving of AI models from any source and facilitates their use for inference in production, all through the familiar language of containers.

来源: https://github.com/containers/ramalama
语言: Python
Stars: 2603

name: ramalama/completions 模块
description: [模块级] ramalama 项目的 completions 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/containers/ramalama

genes.title: completions 模块说明
genes.content:
sudo rm /usr/local/share/bash-completion/completions/ramalama
sudo rm /usr/local/share/fish/vendor_completions.d/ramalama.fish
sudo rm /usr/local/share/zsh/site-functions/_ramalama
```

See the [macOS Installation Guide](docs/MACOS_INSTALL.md) for more details.
